mapper.select: select eo.dept_name deptName from order_info oi left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = oi.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgdr ON cgdr.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = cgdr.car_group_id where osti.state in ('S900','S901') and oi.company_id = #{companyId} group by eo.dept_id

select ci.car_license carLicense from order_info oi left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info osi ON osi.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN car_info ci ON ci.car_id = oi.car_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_car_type_info ecti ON ecti.car_type_id = ci.car_type_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgdr ON cgdr.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = cgdr.car_group_id where osti.state in ('S900','S901') and cgi.it_is_inner = 'C000' and oi.company_id = #{companyId} group by ci.car_license
